text: nam'ma vacanagaḷalli nambike uḷḷavaru nim'ma baḷige bandāga hēḷiri; nim'ma mēle śānti irali. Nim'ma oḍeyanu, kr̥peyannu tanna mēle kaḍḍāya goḷisikoṇḍiruvanu. Eṣṭendare, nim'ma paiki ajñānadinda yāvudādarū duṣkarmavannesagidavanu, ā baḷika paścāttāpa paṭṭu tannannu saripaḍisikoṇḍare, avanu (allāhanu) khaṇḍita kṣamāśīlanū karuṇāḷuvū āgiruvanu
